questions.text: What is my ideal way to spend a Saturday morning?
options: Sleeping in as late as possible
Waking up early for a workout
Enjoying a slow coffee and a book
Running errands to get them done
Going out for a big brunch

questions.text: If I could only eat one cuisine for the rest of my life, what would it be?
How do I typically handle being stressed out?
options: Need to vent and talk it out
Exercise or go for a walk

questions.text: What is my favorite genre of movie?
When planning a vacation, what kind of traveler am I?
What is my absolute biggest pet peeve?
What is my go-to comfort food?
If I won a small lottery ($10k), what's the first thing I'd do?
options: Treat friends and family to dinner

questions.text: What kind of superpower would I choose?
How do I feel about surprise parties?
options: I'd hate being the center of attention
Only if it's just close friends
I'd prefer to be the one surprising someone else
I like the idea, but I'd probably figure it out

questions.text: What is my preferred way to receive affection?
What is my favorite season?
If I had to give up one everyday item, what would be the hardest?
What is my typical role in a group setting?
How do I prefer to resolve a disagreement between us?
options: Take an hour to cool off first
Sleep on it and talk tomorrow
Make a joke to break the tension first

questions.text: What would I pick as my last meal on Earth?
Am I more of a morning person or night owl?
options: I wish I could be both

questions.text: What kind of music do I put on when I need to focus?
How do I prefer to celebrate my birthday?
options: Quiet dinner with a few close people
I'd rather not make a fuss
A trip or experience over a party

questions.text: What's my take on social media?
options: I post and scroll a lot
I use it mostly for memes and news
I try to limit my time on it
I've mostly stepped back from it

questions.text: If I could live anywhere in the world, where?
options: A big city with great food and culture
Somewhere I haven't been yet—adventure first

questions.text: What's my love language when it comes to giving?
options: I show love by doing things for you
I tell you how I feel in words

questions.text: How do I usually make big decisions?
options: Talk it through with someone I trust
I procrastinate until I have to choose

questions.text: What's my ideal Friday night?
options: Out at a restaurant or bar
Cozy night in with a movie
Whatever feels right in the moment

questions.text: How do I feel about small talk?
options: I'd rather skip to the deep stuff
I'm good at keeping it going

questions.text: What would I do if I had a completely free day with no obligations?
options: Catch up on sleep and rest
Spend it with people I love
Binge a show or read all day

questions.text: What's my relationship with my phone?
options: I use it but try to put it away with people
I could take or leave it
I get anxious if I don't have it
I've been trying to use it less

questions.text: How do I like to be cheered up when I'm down?
options: Do something fun to distract me
Bring food or a small treat
Just be there—no need to fix it

questions.text: What's my go-to drink order?
options: Depends on the time and mood

questions.text: Am I more of a saver or a spender?
options: A mix—I save for goals but enjoy life
I don't think about it much
It depends what we're talking about

questions.text: What's the best gift I've ever received?
options: Something practical I use every day
Something I'd never buy for myself

questions.text: How do I handle conflict at work or with friends?
options: Vent first, then deal with it
It depends on the person and situation

questions.text: What's my ideal Sunday?
options: Quality time with family or partner

questions.text: Do I consider myself more introverted or extroverted?
options: I need both social time and alone time

questions.text: What's something I need to feel secure in our relationship?
options: Knowing we can work through conflict

questions.text: What hobby would I pick up if I had unlimited time?
How do I like to receive bad news?
options: Give me a heads-up, then details
Let me process before we discuss
With a silver lining if there is one

questions.text: What's my stance on plans?
options: I love having plans on the calendar
I like a mix of planned and spontaneous
I get stressed without a plan

questions.text: What would I name a pet (or what's my dream pet)?
How do I recharge after a hard week?
What's my opinion on PDA (public displays of affection)?
options: I'm not really a PDA person

questions.text: What's my relationship with exercise?
options: I love it—it's part of my routine
I do it but it's not my favorite
I avoid it when I can

questions.text: How do I feel about surprises in general?
options: I prefer to know what's coming

questions.text: What's my communication style when I'm upset?
options: I need to talk it out right away
I need time before I can talk
I tend to get emotional quickly
I try to stay calm and logical

questions.text: What would make me feel most loved on a random Tuesday?
options: A text or call just to say hi
Coming home to something done (chore, meal)

questions.text: If I could have dinner with anyone, dead or alive, who?
options: A friend I've lost touch with
Someone who could give me advice

questions.text: What's my ideal temperature for the thermostat?
How do I like to learn new things?
options: I like to figure it out as I go

questions.text: What's my take on traditions?
options: I love them and want to keep them
I like making new ones together

questions.text: What would I want my partner to do if I'm sick?
options: Help with errands so I can rest

questions.text: Am I a plant person?
options: Yes—I have (or want) lots of plants
I like them but don't prioritize them

questions.text: What's my ideal weekend getaway?
How do I feel about receiving compliments?
options: I appreciate them but don't need many

questions.text: What's my relationship with cooking?
options: I can cook but it's not my passion

questions.text: What would I never compromise on?
How do I like to spend the holidays?
options: I like to switch it up

questions.text: How do I usually feel when we're apart for a few days?
options: I miss them but I'm fine
I like to check in often
It depends how busy I am

questions.text: What's my go-to karaoke song (or what would it be)?
How do I handle jealousy?
options: I try not to feel it
I've had to learn to manage it

questions.text: What's my love language when it comes to receiving?
What's my ideal date night?
options: Trying a new restaurant or activity
Whatever we're in the mood for

questions.text: How do I feel about meeting the family?
options: I get nervous but want to make a good impression
I like to take my time before that step
It's important to me that they like me
I focus on the relationship first

questions.text: What's my relationship with clutter?
options: I'm messy but I know where things are

questions.text: What would I want to be remembered for?
How do I like to celebrate achievements (mine or ours)?
What's my take on splitting bills and finances in a relationship?
How do I like to wake up?
What's my ideal morning routine?
What would I do if we disagreed on where to live?
options: Talk until we find a compromise
Prioritize one person's job or family
We'd have to find a middle ground
I'd want to understand their reasons first

questions.text: How do I show up when my partner is going through something hard?
options: I listen and ask what they need
I try to fix it or help solve it
I give space but check in
I show love in my usual way

questions.text: What's my favorite way to stay in touch with long-distance people?
How do I feel about merging friend groups?
options: I don't think about it much

questions.text: What's my relationship with my family?
What would I want my partner to know about my past?
options: Everything, when the time is right

questions.text: How do I like to be supported when I'm pursuing a goal?
options: Practical help when I need it

questions.text: What's my ideal number of close friends?
How do I feel about social media and our relationship?
options: I prefer to keep it private

questions.text: What's my take on having kids (or more kids)?
options: Open to it with the right person

questions.text: What would I do if my partner wanted to move for a job?
options: I'd want to talk through all options

questions.text: How do I like to apologize or make up after a fight?
options: Talk it through when we're calm

questions.text: What's my relationship with my phone in bed?
options: I try to put it away
I use it for alarm only
I fall asleep with something on
I'm trying to break the habit

questions.text: What's my ideal vacation length?
options: I'm happy with whatever we can do

questions.text: How do I feel about surprises for me (birthday, etc.)?
What's my love language for giving to my partner?
What would make me feel most appreciated by my partner?
What's my stance on sharing passwords or devices?
options: We know each other's but don't use

questions.text: How do I like to spend a rainy day?
options: Cozy inside with a movie or book

questions.text: What's my relationship with fashion or how I dress?
options: I care and like to look good
I have a style I stick to
I don't think about it much

questions.text: What would I want to do for our anniversary?
How do I handle it when my partner is in a bad mood?
What's my ideal division of household chores?
options: We hire help where we can
We figure it out as we go

questions.text: How do I feel about pets in the bed?
What's my relationship with alcohol or going out?
options: It's not a big part of my life

questions.text: What would I want my partner to do if I'm stressed about work?
How do I like to give feedback or criticism?
What's my take on long-distance relationship phases?
options: I could do it if it's temporary

questions.text: How do I feel about big romantic gestures (e.g. anniversary surprises)?
What's my relationship with my in-laws?

options: We'd need to respect each other
I'd want to understand their view

questions.text: How do I like to be surprised (if at all)?
What's my ideal Sunday evening?
options: Doing something fun to extend the weekend

questions.text: How do I feel about sharing a bank account (eventually)?
options: I prefer separate plus joint for shared
We'd need to talk it through

questions.text: What's my relationship with my partner's friends?
options: I want to be friends with them
It matters that they like me
I don't need to be super close

questions.text: What would I want if I were in the hospital?
options: Partner there as much as possible
Visits but also rest for them

questions.text: How do I like to receive love when I'm busy or stressed?
options: Just don't add to my stress

questions.text: What's my take on having a joint hobby vs separate ones?
How do I feel about talking about our long-term plans (family, where we'll live, etc.)?
options: I like to know we're aligned
We talk about it when it comes up

questions.text: What's my relationship with my partner's family?
options: I want to be part of the family

questions.text: What would I do if my partner forgot an important date?
options: I'd be hurt but would say so
I'd try not to make a big deal
It depends how important it is to me
I'd want to talk about why it matters

questions.text: How do I like to celebrate small wins?
What's my ideal work-life balance?
How do I feel about my partner having close opposite-sex (or same-sex) friends?

How do I like to celebrate big milestones (e.g. anniversaries)?
How do I like to be comforted when I'm anxious?
What's my take on splitting decision-making (big and small)?
options: We decide together on big stuff
One of us leads in certain areas

questions.text: How do I feel about my partner's relationship with an ex?
options: I'd want to know the situation

questions.text: What's my relationship with my own alone time in the relationship?
options: I need more than I get

questions.text: What would I want if we hit a rough patch?
How do I like to show my partner I'm thinking of them?
What's my ideal frequency of seeing family?
How do I feel about my partner traveling without me?
options: I miss them but support it

questions.text: What's my relationship with gift-giving (holidays, etc.)?
What would I want my partner to do if they were upset with me?
How do I like to spend time when we're both home but doing our own thing?
How do I feel about sharing our relationship on social media?
options: I prefer to keep it private

questions.text: How do I feel about my partner having a demanding job or hobby?
options: Depends on the phase of life

questions.text: What's my relationship with my partner's past?
options: I'm curious but don't need details
I want to know the important stuff
I don't need to know much
It comes up when it comes up
I'd want honesty if I ask

questions.text: What's my ideal kind of trip with my partner?
How do I like to be supported when I'm sad?
What's my ideal balance of nights in vs out?
options: Whatever we're in the mood for

questions.text: How do I feel about my partner being close with their family?
What's my relationship with my partner's career ambitions?
options: I want balance with our life

questions.text: What would I want if we had a misunderstanding?
options: Write or text to organize thoughts
Give it a minute then talk

questions.text: How do I like to be told I'm loved?
options: I show it more than I say it

questions.text: What's my take on having a designated "date night"?
options: We don't need to schedule it
I'd want it to feel natural

questions.text: How do I feel about my partner needing more or less social time than me?
options: I'd want to understand their needs

questions.text: What's my relationship with my partner's hobbies that I don't share?
options: I'd want some shared hobbies too

questions.text: What would I want if I felt taken for granted?
How do I like to reconnect after we've been apart?
What's my ideal way to handle money in a serious relationship?
options: We'd talk about it when we get there

questions.text: How do I feel about my partner's relationship with their ex's family?
options: We'd talk if it came up

questions.text: What's my relationship with change (moving, job change, etc.)?
What would I want my partner to know about my needs in the relationship?
How do I like to spend our first few minutes in the morning together?
What's my vision for us in 5 or 10 years?
options: I'm open to what we build

questions.text: How do I feel about my partner having secrets or private things?
options: I'd want honesty about big stuff

questions.text: What's my relationship with saying "I love you"?
options: I say it when I mean it

questions.text: What would I want if we disagreed on something major?
options: Know we can agree to disagree sometimes

questions.text: What's the one thing I'd want my partner to never forget about me?
options: What I need when I'm struggling
